joyBoy_care_response.message: Cảm ơn bạn đã dành thời gian đánh giá sản phẩm. JoyBoy rất vui khi biết bạn hài lòng với sản phẩm và dịch vụ của JoyBoy. Nếu có bất kỳ câu hỏi nào khác, vui lòng liên hệ với JoyBoy qua các kênh hỗ trợ của JoyBoy nhé. Chúc bạn một ngày vui vẻ!

results.product_name: [Blooming Edition] Má Hồng Dạng Nước Dear Dahlia Petal Drop Liquid Blush 4g
results.product_ingredient: Water, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Iron Oxides, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A lightweight liquid blush from DEAR DAHLIA's Blooming Edition, offering a natural, dewy flush with long-lasting color. Infused with Dahlia flower extract, it hydrates and blends seamlessly for a radiant complexion.

results.product_name: Son Thỏi Hiệu Ứng Lì Mịn Dear Dahlia Lip Paradise Effortless Matte Lipstick (3,2G)
results.product_ingredient: Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Octyldodecanol, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Jojoba Seed Oil, Mica, Red 7 Lake, Tocopherol
results.product_description: DEAR DAHLIA Lip Paradise Effortless Matte Lipstick delivers a smooth, velvety matte finish with vibrant color payoff. Enriched with Dahlia extract, it ensures comfortable wear without drying the lips.

results.product_name: Phấn Phủ Trang Điểm Dear Dahlia Skin Paradise Soft Velvet Setting Powder Compact 10g
results.product_ingredient: Talc, Silica, Dimethicone, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Boron Nitride, Magnesium Stearate, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A finely milled setting powder that blurs imperfections and sets makeup for a soft, velvety finish. Infused with Dahlia extract, it controls oil while keeping skin hydrated.

results.product_name: Má Hồng Trang Điểm Dear Dahlia Blooming Edition Petal Glow Blush 3.8g
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Talc, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Sodium Hyaluronate
results.product_description: This Blooming Edition blush delivers a soft, glowing finish with buildable color. Infused with Dahlia extract, it nourishes skin while adding a healthy, radiant flush.

results.product_name: Phấn Bắt Sáng Dear Dahlia Blooming Edition Endless Glow Illuminator - Sunlit (7.2g)
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Tin Oxide
results.product_description: A luminous highlighter from the Blooming Edition, providing a radiant, sunlit glow. Infused with Dahlia extract, it blends effortlessly for a natural, dewy finish.

results.product_name: Phấn Phủ Bột Kiềm Dầu Dear Dahlia Skin Paradise Soft Velvet Finishing Powder 12g
results.product_ingredient: Talc, Silica, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Zinc Oxide, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A lightweight finishing powder that controls oil and sets makeup with a soft, velvety finish. Infused with Dahlia extract, it minimizes shine while keeping skin smooth.

results.product_name: Bút Kẻ Viền Mắt Dear Dahlia Paradise Dream Precision Pro Liquid Eyeliner 0.5Ml
results.product_ingredient: Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Carbon Black, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A precision liquid eyeliner with a fine tip for sharp, defined lines. Infused with Dahlia extract, it delivers intense pigmentation with long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.

results.product_name: Màu Mắt Dạng Bút Dear Dahlia Ánh Nhũ Perfect Designing Shadow Stick 0.9g
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Isododecane, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Synthetic Wax, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Tocopherol
results.product_description: A creamy, blendable eyeshadow stick with a shimmering finish, perfect for quick and easy application. Infused with Dahlia extract, it glides on smoothly for a dazzling eye look.

results.product_name: Son Kem Hiệu Ứng Nhung Mịn Dear Dahlia Paradise Dream Velvet Lip Mousse (6.5Ml)
results.product_ingredient: Dimethicone, Water, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Isododecane, Titanium Dioxide, Red 28 Lake, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A luxurious lip mousse with a velvety, weightless texture and rich color. Infused with Dahlia extract, it provides lasting hydration and a soft, blurred finish for all-day comfort.

results.product_name: Son Kem Lì Mịn Dear Dahlia Sensuous Matte Lip Suit Liquid Lipstick 4ml
results.product_ingredient: Isododecane, Dimethicone, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Red 7 Lake, Titanium Dioxide
results.product_description: A sensuous matte liquid lipstick with intense color and a smooth, non-drying formula. Infused with Dahlia extract, it offers all-day wear with a luxurious finish.

results.product_name: Màu Mắt Đa Năng Dear Dahlia Paradise Dual Palette [Mix] Eye Shadow Trio Mauve Dust 4g
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Talc, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Ultramarine
results.product_description: A multi-use eyeshadow trio in Mauve Dust shades, perfect for creating soft, versatile eye looks. Infused with Dahlia extract for a smooth, pigmented finish.

results.product_name: Màu mắt Và Dưỡng Môi Dear Dahlia Paradise Dual Palette [Match] Multi-Balm & Eye Shadow Trio
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Shea Butter, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Jojoba Seed Oil, Beeswax
results.product_description: A versatile palette featuring a multi-balm for lips and cheeks and an eyeshadow trio for coordinated looks. Infused with Dahlia extract, it hydrates while delivering vibrant color.

results.product_name: Son Kem Thuần Chay Dear Dahlia Dream Velvet Lip Cloud 4g
results.product_ingredient: Dimethicone, Water, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Isododecane, Titanium Dioxide, Red 28 Lake, Phenoxyethanol
results.product_description: A vegan liquid lipstick with a dreamy, velvety texture and vibrant color. Infused with Dahlia extract, it offers a cruelty-free, long-lasting formula for a perfect pout.

results.product_name: Màu Mắt Ánh Nhũ Lấp Lánh Dear Dahlia Paradise Shine Eye Sequins 4g
results.product_ingredient: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Tin Oxide
results.product_description: A sparkling eyeshadow with dazzling sequin-like shimmer for bold eye looks. Infused with Dahlia extract, it delivers vibrant, long-lasting shine.
